message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $15,000. Given its significance and the fact that it's worth $8,000 to you, I propose we strike a deal that benefits both of us. I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $12,000. This price not only ensures you get a great deal but also allows me to appreciate its true worth while catering to your needs. Let's make this transaction happen!
